name: Painting Thief Thief!
description:
You're an artist, and someone has stolen your hard work!! They've put it in a museum and are trying to pass it off as their own, and it's up to you to sneak in and steal it back! Some of your friends' art has also been stolen, so if you see any along the way, make sure to grab those too!

This game is SUPER unfinished and i wish i couldve made it better, but we started late and didnt have the time to do the things we wanted

Still, i hope its fun to play!! at least we have sound this time ;3
Code and Audio by mizu, Art by PikaPie

CONTROLS:

WASD - Move
Left Click/Spacebar - Shoot
Right Click - Pick Up
Scroll - Change Color
E - Inventory
Scroll/A D - Scroll in inventory

Paintings by:

PikaPie
Dre
Smiley
GoldenWing
Creepa-Bot
Shackle
